name: Belly Slide
description:
Play as a cute penguin. Slide with your belly, perform cool dashes and backflips to avoid obstacles in truly parkour way! 

Game made during 3 days Game Jam -> ScoreSpace Jam #19

Controls

Use Only Mouse

  • First Mouse Click - Pick direction to dash
  • Second Mouse Click - Confirm direction and Perform a dash

To Perform backflip get into the air with high speed

Instructions
  • Rocks decrease your velocity
  • Sliding  on an icy platform gives you even more speed
  • Falling down or hitting the Spikes causes gameover
  • Complete darkness causes gameover
  • Garther points to prevent darkness
  •  Dash counter restores as player touches the platform
  • Perform  backflip to remove darkness
